author: Special Correspondent
text:
The civil supplies and consumer protection department’s grievance redressal camps for this month will be held at 10 a.m. on Saturday. Residents could submit petitions regarding changes in family cards, deficiencies in the functioning of fair price shops or PDS commodities supplies, unfair trade practices or defects in goods sold in the market.

The camps will be held at: St.Mark Middle School, Vepery High Road; Chennai Higher Secondary School, A.A.Thitta Salai, New Washermenpet; Chennai Primary School, Pappamal 12{+t}{+h}Street, GKM Colony, Peravallur; Jaigopal Garodia Higher Secondary School, Choolaimedu; Meenakshi Matriculation Higher Secondary School, 52{+n}{+d}Street, Anna Nagar Western Extension; Central Revenue Quarters, 15{+t}{+h}Main Road, Anna Nagar; Sri Gurumurthy Vidyalaya High School, R.V.Nagar, Kodungaiyur; MGR Nagar Residential Welfare Association, 2{+n}{+d}Street, MGR Nagar, Puzhal; Chennai Middle School, Kamarajar Street, MGR Nagar; St.Louis Institute for the Deaf and the Blind, Canal Bank Road, Gandhi Nagar, Adyar; Nidhi Higher Secondary School, Alandur; Periyar Community Hall, Cheran Street, RMK Nagar, New Perungulathur; Sri Annapoorani Ammal Middle School, Old Mambalam Rd., Saidapet; Chennai Middle School, Rama Street, Nungambakkam; Chennai Corporation Community College, Arunachalam Street, Chepauk; Panchayat Office, Sithalapakkam.
title: Civil supplies grievance redressal camps today
